text: ASI Data Science | Senior Full Stack Engineer | London | Onsite, Visa Sponsorship Available, http://www.asidatascience.com/careers ASI is building a truly innovative data science platform (https://sherlockml.com), capable of handling petabyte-scale data analysis.
